All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Editable
Interface allows methods to be inherited by a class that would manipulate contexts of TextLine
EditableTextLine
The EditableTextLine class extends the TextLine class and implements the Editable interface.
TextLine
TextLine class holds information for TextLines.
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException
This class entends IndexOutOfBoundsException and serves as an exception class.
